item.title: Seeing through Python's eyes, computer vision for all
item.description:
Description

Maciej Urbański presents the applications of Python for computer vision, including face detection, object detection, multi-object tracking, and pose estimation.

Presentation at the 2019 Tech Power Summit by STX Next.

Get more guides, news, and videos from STX Next: Website - https://stxnext.com LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/stx-next-python-experts/ Twitter - https://twitter.com/STXNext Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/StxNext/ Behance - https://www.behance.net/STXNextTeam Dribbble - https://dribbble.com/STXNext/ Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/stx_next/
item.dc:creator: Maciej Urbański
